Text.Value: Z'rell? Very well - do as you will. And know that I'm watching.
Pardon - you are a Disciple, indeed. The Towers are yours to explore.
*The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

EditorData.SFXTags: [KB] Mark of the Absolute start and end
EditorData.VFXTags: [KB] Mark of the Absolute start and end

Text.Value: I know my orders. For the Absolute.
*Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*
I work for the General. Perhaps he should hear of your insolence.
Attack.
*Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*
Very well - if the General wishes.
Commune with your parasite, plant a thought: 'This one is a disciple.'
What madness is this? A traitor to the Absolute.
Draw on the power within to enforce your will.
*The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*
*Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*
Draw on the power within to enforce your will.
Commune with your parasite, plant a thought: 'This one is a disciple.'
I - no need, madam. Travel the Towers as you see fit.
I - no need, sir. Travel the Towers as you see fit.
I - no need. Travel the Towers as you see fit.
Stand down, on the General's orders. This one may seek the audience of her choosing.
Stand down, on the General's orders. This one may seek the audience of his choosing.
Stand down, on the General's orders. This one may seek the audience of their choosing.
*A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Delete if you are talking to a companion.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KB] Mark of the Absolute start and end
EditorData.VFXTags: [KB] Mark of the Absolute start and end

Text.Value: Halt. I know neither your stride nor your bearing.
*As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

EditorData.SFXTags: [KB] Mark of the Absolute start and end
EditorData.VFXTags: [KB] Mark of the Absolute start and end

Text.Value: Disciple Z'rell sent me with urgent news for the General.
*A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*
*A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
*You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*
*Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*
Disciples may enter. All others are to be culled, by the General's decree.

Synopsis: A guard questions intruding players on the upper floor of Moonrise Tower
